data.comment: Oliver Langford starts the match. Stoke with the kick-off in Stoke.
At bet365 Stadium, Jamie Paterson has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, Goal! Bristol City have got their heads in front thanks to a Nahki Wells strike.
Bristol City kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Sam Vokes with Steven Fletcher. This is the first substitution made today by Michael O'Neill.
Nick Powell (Stoke) has received a yellow card from Oliver Langford.
The home team replace Jacob Brown with Tyrese Campbell.
In the minute 77, Dean Holden is making the team's first substitution at bet365 Stadium with Antoine Semenyo replacing Chris Martin.
Dean Holden (Bristol City) is making a second substitution, with Chris Brunt replacing Jamie Paterson.
Josh Tymon is on a sub for Bruno Martins Indi for Stoke.
In the minute 83, Bristol City make their third substitution with Famara Diedhiou replacing Nahki Wells.
Goal! Bristol City extend their lead to 0-2 through Andreas Weimann.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
